<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2912</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conflict Resolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cuberschneidung-Zerlegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résolution de Conflit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Definição Do Conflito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risoluzione Di Conflitto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίλυση ψυχικών συγκρούσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resolución Del Conflicto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit which teaches students about conflicts and how to prevent, manage, and resolve them peacefully</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conflicts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conflict resolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit, die 
Kursteilnehmer über $überschneidungen unterrichtet und wie man 
verhindert, sie handhaben und friedlich beheben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive qui enseigne des 
étudiants au sujet des conflits et comment empêcher, les contrôler,
et résoudre paisiblement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa que ensine 
estudantes sobre conflitos e como impedir, para controlá-los, e 
resolver pacificamente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva che insegna gli 
allievi circa i conflitti e come evitare, gestirli e risolvere 
pacificamente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα που 
διδάσκει τους σπουδαστές για τις συγκρούσεις και πώς να τους 
αποτρέψει, να διαχειριστεί, και να επιλύσει ειρηνικά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva que enseña a 
estudiantes sobre conflictos y cómo prevenir, manejarlos, y resolver 
pacífico</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">$überschneidungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">$überschneidungzerlegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conflits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résolution de conflit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade em linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conflitos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità in linea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conflitti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">risoluzione di conflitto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unidad en línea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conflictos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resolución del conflicto</string>
          </keyword>
